metadata.label: New Connection
metadata.description:
The HTTP client provides the capability for initiating contact with a remote HTTP service. The API it
provides includes the functions for the standard HTTP methods forwarding a received request and sending requests
using custom HTTP verbs.

metadata.label: config
metadata.description: The configurations to be used when initializing the `client`

metadata.label: Connection Scope
metadata.description: Scope of the connection, Global or Local

metadata.label: New Connection
metadata.description:
The HTTP client provides the capability for initiating contact with a remote HTTP service. The API it
provides includes the functions for the standard HTTP methods forwarding a received request and sending requests
using custom HTTP verbs.

metadata.label: httpVersion
metadata.description: The HTTP version understood by the client

metadata.label: timeout
metadata.description: The maximum time to wait (in seconds) for a response before closing the connection

metadata.label: compression
metadata.description: Specifies the way of handling compression (`accept-encoding`) header

metadata.label: circuitBreaker
metadata.description: Configurations associated with the behaviour of the Circuit Breaker

metadata.label: responseLimits
metadata.description: Configurations associated with inbound response size limits

metadata.label: validation
metadata.description: Enables the inbound payload validation functionalty which provided by the constraint package. Enabled by default

metadata.label: socketConfig
metadata.description: Provides settings related to client socket configuration

metadata.label: laxDataBinding
metadata.description:
Enables or disables relaxed data binding on the client side. Disabled by default.
When enabled, the JSON data will be projected to the Ballerina record type and
during the projection, nil values will be considered as optional fields and
absent fields will be considered for nilable types

metadata.label: Connection Scope
metadata.description: Scope of the connection, Global or Local

metadata.label: New Connection
metadata.description:
Ballerina Redis connector provides the capability to access Redis cache.
This connector lets you to perform operations to access and manipulate key-value data stored in a Redis database.

metadata.label: Connection Type
metadata.description: Connection configurations of the Redis server. This can be either a single URI or a set of parameters

metadata.label: Connection Pooling Enabled
metadata.description: Flag to indicate whether connection pooling is enabled

metadata.label: Cluster Mode Enabled
metadata.description: Flag to indicate whether the connection is a cluster connection

metadata.label: Connection Scope
metadata.description: Scope of the connection, Global or Local
